title: Mexico soccer federation condemns weekend stabbing
description: The Mexican Soccer Federation has issued a statement condemning violence among fans, after one Mexico fan stabbed another at a Sunday match

title: WATCH:  Roller coaster riders stranded upside down rescued
description: Riders became stuck on an amusement park ride after it broke down, stranding them upside down for hours.

title: Suspect in fatal shooting at a New Mexico movie theater will remain jailed until his trial
description: A judge has ruled that a man accused in a deadly movie theater shooting in Albuquerque will remain in jail until trial

title: Highland Park gathers to remember parade shooting victims, push for change
description: Hundreds of people gathered to mark the one year since seven Fourth of July paradegoers were shot and dozens of others were wounded in a mass shooting.

title: Israeli forces fire tear gas inside hospital as raid continues
description: Israeli forces fired tear gas inside of a hospital in the West Bank city of Jenin as the large-scale raid entered its second day.

title: Secret Service investigating 'unknown item' found inside White House complex
description: It was described in radio traffic as cocaine hydrochloride.

title: The wanted overseas-based Hong Kong activists will be pursued for life, leader says
description: Hong Kong’s leader says eight pro-democracy activists who now live in the United States, Britain, Canada and Australia will be pursued for life for alleged national security offenses

title: Missing woman found alive after being stuck in mud for several days
description: Emma Tetewsky, a missing woman from Massachusetts, was found alive in Borderland State Park after she had been missing for several days.

title: Man steals forklift from a Maryland store and rams a car, killing a woman, authorities say.
description: Authorities say a man stole a forklift from a Maryland home improvement store and killed a woman in the parking lot after ramming the car in which she was sleeping

title: WATCH:  Maid of honor devises creative way to be there for bride during photoshoot
description: She understood the assignment.

title: Kremlin open to talks over potential prisoner swap involving detained US reporter Evan Gershkovich
description: The Kremlin is holding the door open for contacts with the U.S. regarding a possible prisoner exchange that could potentially involve jailed Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich

title: Masked assailants attack journalist and lawyer in Russia's Chechnya province
description: Masked assailants in the Russian province of Chechnya have attacked and beaten a journalist and a lawyer

title: Taliban ban women's beauty salons in Afghanistan
description: A spokesman at Afghanistan's Vice and Virtue Ministry says the Taliban are banning women's beauty salons

title: Israel presses on with hunt for West Bank militants; Death toll rises to 10
description: The raid is one of the most intense military operations in the area in decades.

title: 3 killed, 8 injured in late-night Forth Worth shooting in Texas
description: At least three people have been killed and eight more injured in a late-night shooting in Fort Worth, Texas, police have confirmed.

title: Outrage in South Africa over video of deputy president's security stomping on man
description: A group of armed plainclothes officers assigned to protect South Africa’s deputy president were caught on video dragging a man out of a car and then stomping on his head until he lies motionless, sparking outrage and drawing more attention to the count...

title: Helicopter crashes during landing in Switzerland, all 5 aboard unharmed
description: A helicopter has crashed during landing in the Swiss Alps, but all five people aboard were unharmed

title: China restricts exports of high-tech metals in a slap at Washington
description: China has imposed export curbs on two metals used in computer chips and solar cells, expanding a squabble with Washington over high-tech trade ahead of Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen’s visit to Beijing this week

title: Storm in Slovenia derails train, damages buildings and injures 2 passengers on a bus
description: A strong storm in Slovenia has caused a train to derail, flooded roads, damaged buildings and slightly injured two people who were riding in a bus that was hit by a dislodged rock

title: 1 dead, 9 injured in July 4th weekend fireworks explosion
description: One woman has died and nine other have been injured after a firework exploded at a home late Monday night, police say.

title: July 4 Highland Park parade shooting: Remembering the victims 1 year later
description: Seven people were killed in the 2022 mass shooting in Illinois.

title: WATCH:  Supermoon shines around the world
description: July's supermoon rises over landmarks including Greece's Temple of Poseidon and the Great Pyramids of Egypt.

title: 4 dead, 2 children in stable condition in Philadelphia shooting: Police
description: Four people are dead and two are hospitalized in stable condition following a mass shooting late Monday night in Philadelphia, officials said.

title: Multiple people have been shot in Philadelphia and a suspect is in custody, police say
description: Police say multiple people have been shot in Philadelphia

title: US judge blocks portions of new Florida elections law
description: A federal judge is blocking Florida from enforcing part of a new elections law that bans non-citizens from handling or or collecting voter registration forms

title: Hawaii State Capitol to get metal detectors after lawmakers and aides say they don't feel safe
description: The Hawaii State Capitol will have metal detectors installed at three entrances starting July 10
